title: Lovely Two Bed Apartment in Gold Coast! Find Your Next Place Today!
map_address: North Lake Shore Dr near Schiller
posting_body: Just north of the Magnificent Mile along the shores of Lake Michigan sits this beautiful apartment, steps from the best of Chicago.

Affording easy access to the Lakefront Trail, Oak Street and North Avenue Beaches, world-renowned shopping, dining, and cultural attractions, our spacious and pet-friendly 1- bedroom apartment is your home in the coveted Gold Coast neighborhood.
This building offers a variety of floor plan options and finishes, as well as some of most beautiful lake views in the city of Chicago.
The spectacular views of Lake Michigan and downtown Chicago from the rooftop deck are not to be missed, and make it a night with the grilling stations and fire pit.
